participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

CASI_03.LongName:
Age when first started using on regular basis (i.e. at least once per month)

If never used at least once per month enter 00

CASI_04.LongName: In the past year, what was your typical pattern of use?

Levels.5: Two or more times per month
Levels.7: Two or more times per week

CASI_05.LongName: In the past year, what was your peak pattern of use?

Levels.5: Two or more times per month
Levels.7: Two or more times per week

CASI_06.LongName: When you use, with whom do you use typically?

Levels.5: Acquaintance(s)
Levels.7: Other

CASI_07.LongName: When you use, what is your most usual or most recent route of administration?

Levels.5: IV-injection

CASI_08.LongName: In the past month, how many days did you use?

CASI_9.LongName:
How long have you used?
Enter Years here and enter Months below:
